sentence.idiomatic: After this activity concludes everyone will get a gift.
If a problem arises with the product you purchased within the first month, our company will exchange a new one for you.
Who will become the champion of this competition?
It doesn’t matter. A short separation won’t influence our feelings.
Although the time they have known each other is short, they have already become good friends.
That brief work experience has changed him a lot.
If you want to wholly understand China, you need to further understand Chinese history.
If we don’t further analyze the reason for our failure we might fail again.
After having further conversations, I finally knew the reason why she did this.
Our company takes our customers’ valuable opinions very seriously.
Such valuable business opportunities – what businessman would let them slip away?
Countless soldiers offered up their precious lives for the unification of the country.
When I was learning Chinese I came into contact with a lot of knowledge about Chinese medicine.
Only once you’ve come in contact with a lot of customers then you can understand the customers’ true demands.
Although being a journalist is tiring, you get to come into contact with a lot of new things.
Because of the need to develop new products, the relationship between these two companies is becoming more and more inseparable.
Humankind and the environment are inseparably linked together. Therefore, we need to protect the environment well.
This victory stems from all the team members’ inseparably close unity.
I will certainly try my hardest to complete the work.

word.literal: to do one's best to fulfill

sentence.idiomatic: During this collaboration, you haven’t done your utmost to fulfill your obligations.

word.literal: to put to the best use

sentence.idiomatic: No matter what the result is, as long as you have done the best you can then it’s all right.
I will never forget the support you have given me while I was in difficulty.
The school gave him serious punishment for his violent behavior.
We should give help and encourage the weak, not criticism.
We earnestly hope that you are able to get well soon.
Everyone wholeheartedly wishes you both happiness forever.
He earnestly prayed to God for peace.
This brings my introduction to an end.
Once again, I would like to thank all the leaders for inviting me to attend this meeting.

Although the time has been short, I have been able to further acquaint myself with China. At the same time, this conference has given me a very precious opportunity to introduce our company’s services to you.
As contact between China and all the countries of the world becomes closer and closer, I think that this type of international cooperation is extremely advantageous to both sides.
Moreover, every member of our team will do his utmost to bring this project to completion.
On behalf of the management of our company, I would like to thank all of you for your support.
Finally, I wholeheartedly wish our collaboration success. I hope and believe that henceforth there will be much more of this kind of cooperation.
